title: This Love Is Brought To You Courtesy of My Ex-Girlfriend. - Novel Updates
author: 御宮ゆう
description:
“I know a lot of good things about you” 

'My ex-girlfriend is my love coach!”

Yuzuki Manami is a beautiful, salt-of-the-earth girl whom everyone admired in her high school days.

I, Hajime Kinugasa, am supposed to be the ex-boyfriend she loved …….

We once had a secret relationship of “fake lovers.'  Now that it’s long since dissolved, what awaits us as sophomores in college is…

“Why are you here?” It was an awkward reunion on a chat app.

I confessed my one-sided love for Yuka Shichino, a friend of mine at the same university.

“I know you better than anyone else.  Manami’s love pointers begin!”

A perfect opponent for preliminary practice.

But when this one-sided love comes true, what will be the relationship between me and Manami?

A slightly mature, coming-of-age romantic comedy that flutters with longing and regret!>
